languages.text: "Зачем, шерин? Это жуткое место уже сделало свое дело — помутило ваш разум. Только безумец захотел бы оставаться здесь хотя бы секундой дольше необходимого".
"But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."
languages.original_text: "Зачем, шерин? Это жуткое место уже сделало свое дело — помутило ваш разум. Только безумец захотел бы оставаться здесь хотя бы секундой дольше необходимого".

traits.locale_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “可你为什么要这么做，亲爱的？这个邪恶的地方已经影响了你，它蒙蔽了你的心智。只有疯子才会打算继续留在这里。”
languages.original_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: “可你为什么要这么做，亲爱的？这个邪恶的地方已经影响了你，它蒙蔽了你的心智。只有疯子才会打算继续留在这里。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「だけど、どうしてなの、シャリーン？この不快な場所がもうあなたの体に影響を与えてる…あんたの心を曇らせているわ。その必要もないのに、1秒でもここに長くいたいと思うだなんて、狂人じゃない限りあり得ないわ」
languages.original_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「だけど、どうしてなの、シャリーン？この不快な場所がもうあなたの体に影響を与えてる…あんたの心を曇らせているわ。その必要もないのに、1秒でもここに長くいたいと思うだなんて、狂人じゃない限りあり得ないわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Pero por qué, shereen? Este repulsivo lugar ya ha ejercido su influencia sobre ti; te ha nublado la mente. Solo un loco querría permanecer aquí ni un segundo más de lo necesario».
languages.original_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pero por qué, shereen? Este repulsivo lugar ya ha ejercido su influencia sobre ti; te ha nublado la mente. Solo un loco querría permanecer aquí ni un segundo más de lo necesario».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « À quoi bon, shereen ? Cet endroit impie a déjà déteint sur vous, il vous embrouille l'esprit. Il faut être fou pour vouloir rester ici une seconde de plus que nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: « À quoi bon, shereen ? Cet endroit impie a déjà déteint sur vous, il vous embrouille l'esprit. Il faut être fou pour vouloir rester ici une seconde de plus que nécessaire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aber warum, Shereen? Dieser faulige Ort zeigt bereits Wirkung bei Euch – er hat Euch den Verstand vernebelt. Nur ein völlig Wahnsinniger würde hier auch nur eine Sekunde länger als nötig bleiben wollen."
languages.original_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Aber warum, Shereen? Dieser faulige Ort zeigt bereits Wirkung bei Euch – er hat Euch den Verstand vernebelt. Nur ein völlig Wahnsinniger würde hier auch nur eine Sekunde länger als nötig bleiben wollen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İyi de neden şirinim? Bu kokuşmuş yer, sana yapabileceğini yaptı zaten. Zihnini bulandırdı. Yalnızca deliler burada gerektiğinden bir saniye daha fazla kalmak ister."
languages.original_text: "But why, shereen? This foul place has done its work on you already — it has clouded your mind. Only a madman would want to stay here even a second longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: "İyi de neden şirinim? Bu kokuşmuş yer, sana yapabileceğini yaptı zaten. Zihnini bulandırdı. Yalnızca deliler" burada gerektiğinden bir saniye daha fazla kalmak isterler."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
